channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Nitrous oxide boxes everywhere

item.title: Flytip, 26th February
item.description:
I got video of the man who flytip on the hill I am more then help to sent it to you I think he lives at 49 prestbury square that where he walked back to pick up more stuff

item.title: A series of potholes, 26th February
item.description:
The road surface is degrading for several meters with a series of growing potholes. The largest could cause a cyclist to be thrown from bike.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Minchenden Crescent, Southgate
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post box issues, 26th February
item.description:
The post box at the West Street end of Ethronvi Road is leaning a lot and has graffiti on it. It lets the area down. Is it possible to straighten it and remove the graffiti please? Might be for the Post Office to straighten but the graffiti is ours? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ethronvi Road, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Edmund Road, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Landscaping required to remove tracks from previous landscaping truck, 26th February
item.description:
Reported by local resident on 29 April 2025, so re-reporting as hasn’t been fixed after 10 months. Just needs some basic landscaping to remove track marks and bring grass vegetation back to life.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deal Porters Walk, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing fence, 26th February
item.description:
Local resident first reported this missing fence on 29 April 2025, ten months ago. Re-reporting as of today it still hasn’t been fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Deal Porters Walk, Rotherhithe, Greater London

item.title: Building waste left., 26th February
item.description:
There is a building waste left on the wooden alley behind Elstree Gardens, DA17 5DW. I reported this earlier and received a confirmation that issue was resolved (reports reference nr: 8409987). Building waste is still there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elstree Gardens, Lessness Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped and getting worse, 26th February
item.description:
I reported this flytipping a week ago and fixmystreet are reporting it as resolved when its clearly not. and more rubbish is getting piled on top and some of it has been pushed onto private property. its now attracting vermin. and the rubbish is finding its way into my drive and certainly others as well.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Close, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
